# The `ArgumentUsesTracker` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This tracker checks whether callees are in the SCC, and if so it does not consider that a capture, instead adding it to the &quot;Uses&quot; list and continuing with the analysis. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This tracker checks whether callees are in the SCC, and if so it does not consider that a capture, instead adding it to the &quot;Uses&quot; list and continuing with the analysis.

Definition at line 535 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp">FunctionAttrs.cpp</a>.

### captured() {#aa35ba8c73830d12eea5dda2a41aba718}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
captured - Information about the pointer was captured by the user of use U.

Return true to stop the traversal or false to continue looking for more capturing instructions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp/#l00540">540</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp">FunctionAttrs.cpp</a>.

### tooManyUses() {#ac3159d15771421a42528b46cf900a56c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;FunctionAttrs.cpp&#125;::ArgumentUsesTracker::tooManyUses ()</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
tooManyUses - The depth of traversal has breached a limit.

There may be capturing instructions that will not be passed into <a href="#aa35ba8c73830d12eea5dda2a41aba718">captured()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp/#l00538">538</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp">FunctionAttrs.cpp</a>.
